resources.string: Will display location data when the recording process begins.
It seems to be your first time using PocketMocker. Before using PocketMocker, you must create a new mocking objective.
Are you sure you want to overwrite the recording for objective?
Please enter a name for the new objective!

PocketMocker is an experiment to protect your privacy through mocking your behavior. After recording initial data, you are free to replay that data as much as you want. When replaying, apps that request that data will see the recorded data instead of the actual data provided by the hardware.

PocketMocker can record and replay the following data:
•Location
•All sensors
•Wifi and Network

Made with <3 in Buffalo, NY.
